commit message:
Address bug in single sign on

If the client sites SSO url contained the sites name, the app would get stuck
in a redirect loop.  Checking the domain instead of the site name fixes this.
Fix misaligned text logo on dozuki sites without custom logos

Fix logged-out crash on Favorite Guides

5.0 introduced an IllegalArgumentException on ContentResolver.isSyncActive if
the account is null.  Easily solvable - just do a null check before calling.

Merge pull request #236 from iFixit/single-sign-on-fix

Address bug in single sign on

Intent filtering: Respond to /Device/name

We already had the code for it in `IntentFilterActivity` but we didn't
have the manifest set up to register the filter.

Merge pull request #237 from iFixit/intent-filtering--respond-to-device

Intent filtering: Respond to /Device/name
